import thunk from'redux-thunk';import{createStore,compose,combineReducers,applyMiddleware}from'redux';import{persistStore,persistReducer}from'redux-persist';import storage from'redux-persist/lib/storage';// localStorage
import{productsReducer}from"./products/reducer";import{searchReducer}from"./search/reducer";import{cartReducer}from"./cart/reducer";import{userReducer}from"./user/reducer";import{linksReducer}from"./links/reducer";var composeEnhancers=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;var persistConfig={key:'root',storage:storage};var rootReducer=combineReducers({products:productsReducer,search:searchReducer,cartProducts:cartReducer,user:userReducer,links:linksReducer});var persistedReducer=persistReducer(persistConfig,rootReducer);// created store
export var store=createStore(persistedReducer,composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware(thunk)));// create persistor
export var persistor=persistStore(store);export default store;
